Detailed Description

The hashtable.

Simple hashtable (array of linklists) with long keys.

Remarks:
To obtain the hash value : index = key % size.

Field Documentation

Bit Flags.

Number of elements in the hashtable.

long _PIZHashTable::size

Number of linklists in the hashtable.

PIZLinklist** _PIZHashTable::hashTable

Pointer to the hashtable's array of linklists.
